title: Cars of the future - expectations
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the highest SOME LABEL 753.0 among the 2 groups and in Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun, I mostly agree had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.
Among all the Races, I totally agree had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Maximal safety and lowest SOME LABEL in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
Race Maximal safety and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun had the biggest gap of 713.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for I totally agree.

In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the highest SOME LABEL 753.0 among the 2 groups and in Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun, I mostly agree had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, I totally agree had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Maximal safety and I mostly agree had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the highest SOME LABEL among all 7 Races and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
Race Maximal safety and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun had the biggest gap of 713.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for I totally agree.
Among the groups, I mostly agree had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 10.6 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.

On average, the Race Maximal safety had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. Whereas Reflecting my socialstatus/my self-image had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
